import React, {Component, useState} from 'react'; import classes from './CenterCard.module.css'; import Aux from '../../../../hoc/Aux/Aux' import { Container, Row, Col } from 'react-bootstrap'; class centercard extends Component { state ={ setIsShown: useState(false) } render(){ return(
this.setIsShown(true)} onMouseLeave={() => this.setIsShown(false)}> >

View Project

Audience: Georgetown ISD Teachers

Date: Spring 2019

Role: Instructional Designer & Trainer

Medium: Instructor-led course with workbook Tools: Adobe Indesign, Google Classroom, Nearpod

) } } export default centercard;
